A4.text: The 2026 Commonwealth Games are scheduled from 23 July to 2 August 2026.

A5.text: The next Commonwealth Games host city Ahmedabad will be known as the Commonwealth Centenary Games in 2030.

A6.text: The most recent edition was held in Birmingham in 2022.

A7.text: The 2026 Commonwealth Games will be the first held under the reign of King Charles III.
